** Barclays upgrades British software company Aveva Group AVV.L to "overweight" from "equal weight", expecting further growth acceleration after the merger with OSIsoft (Full Story)

** With both businesses emerging strongly from the COVID disruption and the improving outlook for the oil sector, for which the companies also provide software, the brokerage sees the ongoing transition to subscription as more of an opportunity for the group than a risk

** Moreover, it sees the upcoming Capital Markets Day on July 1 to frame the investment case, expecting also a supportive set of targets

** It expects a medium-term organic growth target of high-single-digit, modest further margin improvement and a solid double-digit annual recurring revenue (ARR) trajectory
